nodes.text: Porus Vida was a planet located in the Inner Rim and famous for its beauty and its culture.

Porus Vida joined the Galactic Republic prior to the Indecta Era. During the Alsakan Conflicts, it was located in the Exploitation Region. The planet was besieged during the First Alsakan Conflict and again during the Second Alsakan Conflict.
Populated by Humans since at least 60 BBY, Porus Vida was a world with beautiful museums of its culture and manicured gardens.

Porus Vida eventually affiliated with the New Republic and it was one of the first planets attacked by the Imperial forces after the Imperial Reunification in 12 ABY. Victory-class Star Destroyers of the Crimson Command devasted the world under Colonel Ivan Cronus.
